entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -33.9°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 66 %

Dewpoint: -38.1°C

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 38. Wind chill near minus 45. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 31. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 36. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the evening then light before morning. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 40 in the evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
